description:
A bunch of Samsung monitors are featured in Amazon's Memorial Day Sale, including models designed for gaming, working, and everything in between. The best deals slash prices by up to $1,200--so if you're looking to upgrade your battlestation, you'll likely find something that fits your needs. From premium ultrawide gaming monitors to affordable displays, here's a look at the best Samsung monitor deals for Memorial Day. For more Samsung deals, check out our roundup of the best offers in the Discover Samsung sales event.

See
title: Samsung Gaming Monitors Steeply Discounted In Amazon Memorial Day Sale

description: The highly anticipated Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door remake for Nintendo Switch launched today, and if you're looking to show off your hype for the new game, there's an official Paper Mario T-Shirt up for grabs at Amazon--and best of all, it's up to 24% off.
title: This Official Paper Mario T-Shirt Is Nearly 25% Off At Amazon

description: Secretlab is teaming up with Games Workshop on a new Warhammer 40,000 edition of the Titan Evo, giving one of the best gaming chairs a new look based on one of the most popular Warhammer 40K Space Marine chapters, the Ultramarines. It's great timing, too, as the highly anticipated Warhammer: Space Marine 2 is set to release September 9. The stylish new gaming chair is
title: Secretlab Reveals Warhammer 40K: Space Marine Gaming Chair, Preorders Live Now

description:
It's hard to believe that it's been three decades since the third Beverly Hills Cop movie. But this summer, Eddie Murphy's biggest franchise is returning on Netflix with Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F. A lot of things have changed in Los Angeles and Beverly Hills in the 30 years since Beverly Hills Cop 3. But the one thing that remains the same is Murphy's Axel Foley, who just won't take no for an answer in the new trailer for Axel F.

Beverly Hills Cop 4 has been in-and-out of development since the mid-90s. In 2011, there was even a pilot episode for a Beverly Hills Cop TV series that would have followed Axel's son as the main character while Axel was the chief of police in Detroit. Murphy made a cameo appearance in the Beverly Hills Cop pilot, but the show wasn't picked up to series. For Axel F, Murphy's main character has a daughter, Jane Saunders (Taylour Paige), instead of a son. Jane is also somehow tied into the criminal conspiracy that brings Axel back
title: Eddie Murphy's Back In Town In New Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F Trailer

description:
EA has announced that The Sims 4 now has a dedicated team that will primarily focus on addressing ongoing bugs.

The publisher shared the news today in a social media post, where it explained how it plans to combat ongoing technical issues for its popular free-to-play game that have continued to interrupt gameplay over time.

After recognising players' frustration, EA confirmed that it has officially assembled a team "to invest in the core game experience" which includes "tackling reported concerns."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: The Sims 4 Now Has A Dedicated Team That Will Tackle "Frustrating" Technical Issues

description:
It's been over 15 years since the last Banjo-Kazooie game--unless you have managed to convince yourself that Super Smash Bros. Ultimate is a Banjo-Kazooie game. But hey, at least Microsoft and Rare haven't entirely ignored the iconic bear and bird duo, as proven by a somewhat steady drip of official merch. Banjo-Kazooie fans can preorder a new Funko Pop for $13 ahead of its August 14 release.

Preorder at Amazon

Like other Funko Pops, you're getting a cute recreation
title: Fill The Banjo-Kazooie-Sized Hole In Your Heart With This Upcoming Funko Pop

description:
As it has done with previous games in the series, The Pokemon Company periodically gives away free Pokemon and other in-game goodies for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet. Players can currently claim a handful of freebies for the titles, including a Sprigatito and Quaxly inspired by the new Pokemon Horizons anime.

These freebies are usually distributed via the games' Mystery Gift feature and are typically only available for a limited time, so you'll want to snag them while you can. To help, we've put together this roundup of all the free Mystery Gifts currently available for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Full List Of Mystery Gi
title: Pokemon Scarlet And Violet: All The Free Mystery Gifts Available Right Now

description:
After nearly a year since the end of its open beta, a few things have changed in MultiVersus beyond the new characters. Justin Roiland, the co-creator of Rick and Morty and the original voice of both characters, has been removed from the game and all of his lines have been rerecorded.

Via PC Gamer, Roiland's replacements on Rick and Morty, Ian Cardoni and Harry Belden, have taken over their leading roles in MultiVersus as well. As noted in the report, Roiland's original recordings for the game were comprised of snippets of dialogue from the show. But the new build of the game features original voice work by both Cardoni and Beldon as Rick an
title: Justin Roiland's Rick And Morty Voiceovers Were Scrubbed From MultiVersus

description: When you've got a green giant with breathtaking anger management issues tearing up the town, your regular suit of Stark Industries armor isn't going to cut it. That's where the Hulkbuster suit comes into play, as Amazon has opened up preorders for one of the most iconic Iron Man armors of all time. Priced at $60, this big piece of Hulk-punching plastic will release on October 1. The new Hulkbuster figure is part of Marvel's 85th anniversary collection, and it's proving to be extremely popular already. At the time of writing, the Hulkbuster is the No. 1 best-selling action figure on Amazon.
title: Preorder Marvel Legends Hulkbuster, The No. 1 Best-Selling Action Figure On Amazon

description:
XDefiant is off to the races, having reportedly already reached over 3 million unique players, with the first million coming two and a half hours after launch.

The above statistics are according to Insider Gaming, which reports some of the launch numbers surrounding Ubisoft's free-to-play answer to Call of Duty. According to Insider Gaming, the game is "well on its way" when it comes to surpassing Ubisoft's internal goals in terms of number of players. Those launch numbers make XDefiant the fastest Ubisoft game to ever reach 1 million players, and are even bigger than free-to-play competitor Apex Legends. Respawn's battle royale saw around 1 million unique players in its first eight hours after launch back in 2019.

Insider Gaming reports that as of earlier today, May 23, XD
title: XDefiant's Launch Reportedly Hit 1 Million Players In Under 3 Hours

description:
In addition to Gen V, another spin-off of The Boys, The Boys: Mexico, is in the works. However, series creator Eric Kripke has warned fans that they should get comfortable--that show isn't coming anytime soon. In the same interview, Kripke discussed how he believes Marvel did a disservice to itself by creating so many spin-offs that fans had to stay up to date with to understand the overarching story.

Kripke told Entertainment Weekly that The Boys: Mexico is still "a while away" from getting made. Specifically, the team is still putting together a deal with the show's writer for the pilot. "He has an amazing pitch, and we all giggle and think about how fun it would be. But there are a lot of hurdles for that show before it's a real show," Kripke said.

He added, "He's got to write an amazing pilot, he's probably got to write an amazing episode 2. I think he can and he will, but we'r
title: The Boys Creator Says Marvel Was "Hurt" By Asking Fans To Know All The Stories

description:
Just like in previous seasons and new expansions, big changes are coming to several of Destiny 2's Exotic armor pieces in The Final Shape. Bungie has outlined plans to adjust 19 Exotics across all Guardian classes, bringing them up to date with the game's current state and preparing them for the new Prismatic subclass when The Final Shape launches.

Bungie says it has focused on updating Exotic armor and armor mods to reference a player's equipped Super element instead of a specific subclass, allowing those effects to work more smoothly with Prismatic. This in turn will allow their effects to function on Prismatic without changing their behavior on the original subclass. Some of the changes outlined below are very good, with Khepri's Horn, Mantle of Battle Harmony,
title: Destiny 2: The Final Shape Is Overhauling 19 Exotic Armor Pieces

description:
Stellar Blade is getting a new patch tomorrow, May 24, that will add a boss-rush mode as well as new costumes for its protagonist, Eve.

According to the PlayStation Blog, the Boss Challenge mode lets you face off against 19 bosses. Progression in Boss Challenge also requires battle data from bosses you've previously defeated, so you'll need to have played the campaign and faced the bosses before. You can either choose to use your own gear collected during the campaign or pick from several preset loadouts. The minimal preset offers more of a challenge, while the maximum preset has all of Eve's skills and stats buffed up.

There will be three new Nanosuit costumes for Eve. Those who complete the Boss Challenge on Normal difficulty or higher will unlock the Neurolink Suit. The White Kunoichi and Black Kunoichi suits will seemingly be added automatically when the updat
title: Stellar Blade Gets Boss-Rush Mode And New Nanosuits Tomorrow

description:
Leave it to Beetlejuice to put the fun back into funeral. And all it took to bring the gang back together was the death of Charles Deetz, the father of Lydia Deetz (Winona Ryder). Lydia and her teenage daughter, Astrid (Jenna Ortega), have reunited with Lydia's mother, Delia Deetz (Catherine O'Hara), to say goodbye to Charles. But as seen in the new trailer for Beetlejuice Beetlejuice, Astrid's presence sets off a chain of events that unleashes the title character back into the land of the living.

Astrid has found the model of Winter River, Connecticut, that was created by the deceased couple, Barbara and Adam Maitland, from the first film. While neither Geena Davis nor Alec Baldwin reprising their roles as the Maitlands, their model holds the key to Beetlejuice's comeback, and the ghost with the most intends to use it.

By Beetlejuice's admittedly low standards, he's kind of cleaned up in the decades since we last saw him. He now has a wife, as play
title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice Trailer Brings Back The Ghost With The Most

description:
Atari finally won the oldest console war of all recently--even though most of us thought it ended decades ago. The company announced that it bought the Intellivision brand, best-known for being one of its main competitors in the earliest era of home consoles in the late '70s and early '80s.

According to a press release, Atari bought the brand and "certain games" from the existing company known as Intellivision Entertainment. That incarnation of Intellivision has promised the release of a new console called the Amico since late 2018, with a planned release date of October 2020. However, the Amico has been delayed multiple times since then for a variety of reasons, most notably the COVID-19 pandemic.

Despite these setbacks, Atari says that the Amico console will indeed come out at some point in the future--through the company that formerly owned the Intellivision name--and that it will continue to support the mobile app Amico Home. Originally developed
title: Atari Buys Ancient Rival Intellivision, Insists The Amico Is Still Coming

description:
Back in May 2022, MultiVersus--a platform fighter in the vein of Super Smash Bros. featuring characters from across the Warner Bros. portfolio--burst onto the scene in open beta. Shaggy from Scooby-Doo could duke it out with Batman, Bugs Bunny could be seen throwing pies at Arya Stark, and the list of fever dream matchups only grew from there.

After over a year in beta with multiple seasons of additional content, Player First Games and WB decided to pull the game from digital shelves, with the promise that the game would return better than ever. Those who spent money on the game's content demanded refunds but did not receive them, instead they were also promised that all of that content would be intact when the game returned.

Now, in May 2024, the self-imposed hiatus is over: MultiVersus is coming back. We
title: MultiVersus Looks To Return With A Bang After Risky Hiatus

description:
Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus is one of the best video-game adaptations in the series to date, and if you're itching for more turn-based combat in the grimdark universe, you're in luck. Announced at Warhammer Skulls 2024, Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus 2 is coming to consoles and PC with two full campaigns.

Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus 2 will let you play as either the "acolytes of the Omnissiah"--the Machine God--or as the "ancient and deathless Necron legions," according to the official announcement. The two factions will come into direct conflict as Vargard Nefersha wakes from "millenia of slumber" to launch an all-out attack on the Adeptus Mechanicus. It's up to you, of course, to choose which side you'll join, at least until you play through the other campaign.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus 2 Revealed, Features Two Campaigns

description:
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is undoubtedly the most-anticipated Warhammer game in development right now, so it was no surprise that it was given a sizable chunk of the Warhammer Skulls 2024 presentation. Multiplayer fans are in for a treat, as in addition to a new three-player cooperative mode, Space Marine 2 is bringing back PvP so you can prove who really loves the Emperor of Mankind the most.

The PvP offering is split across three game types--Annihilations, Seize Ground, and Capture & Control--with six-versus-six action pitting the Space Marines against the Chaos Space Marines. For those unfamiliar with 40,000 lore, the Chaos Space Marines are turncoats who opted to rebel against the Emperor in the name of Chaos, so there is no love lost here. Six different classes are available (and
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Lets You And Your Friends Cross Chainswords--Or Join Them

description:
Warhammer Skulls 2024, has arrived, offering a huge array of announcements for brand-new games as well as ongoing ones. During the presentation, hosted by actor Rahul Kohli, we got a new look at one of the most-anticipated action games of the year--Space Marine 2--and got more information on games like Darktide, Speed Freeks, and Vermintide 2. We also saw the return of one of the best turn-based tactics games in the Warhammer series, as well as plenty more surprises for fans of practically every genre. Here are all the game announcements from Warhammer Skulls 2024.


Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2


The biggest game of the showcase continues to look extremely impressive, and in the latest presentation, we
title: Warhammer Skulls 2024: All The Game Announcements And News

description:
MultiVersus director Tony Huynh has criticized dataminers for spoiling upcoming content in the game, including the reveal of future fighters and stages. Dataminers have regularly trawled through lines of game code to uncover information on unreleased content, and Huynh says that these leaks leave the developers and fans of Multiversus feeling deflated when they're robbed of a surprise reveal.

"It is an arms race, so it'll be constant protections against new and creative ways to datamine," Huynh said to VGC about the efforts to safeguard information on the game. "At the end of the day, we've done a lot, we've learned a lot, but again, it is an arms race. "I can't promise that there won't ever be leaks or anything like that. But on our end, we've done--I think--above and beyond what industry standards and protections there are."

Huynh also spoke abou
title: MultiVersus Director Criticizes Dataminers For Being Spoilsports

description: Finding games like Minecraft that are sure to capture your unwavering attention much like Mojang's sandbox gem be a challenge. The 2011 masterpiece is one of the best-selling games of all time, after all, standing strong as one of the most highly played titles even more than a decade after its genre-defining release. One can attribute the immense success that Minecraft has seen to its unique blend of sandbox, survival, and RPG features. The creativity it allows players to partake in, whether they're looking to build majestic castles or underwater fortresses, is unri
title: 20 Games Like Minecraft To Play In 2024

description:
There's a chance we'll be given more details about PlayStation's upcoming live-service sci-fi game, Concord, within the next few days. The game's developer is Firewalk Studios and Concord is its debut title.

According to Dealabs, there will a second reveal for Concord within the next 15 days. Whether it would be at a PlayStation showcase or at Summer Game Fest on June 7 is currently unknown. The reveal will reportedly show off some playable characters in Concord, as well as some new gameplay footage.

The upcoming info was reportedly already prepared for the State of Play presentation back in
title: Details On PS5 Multiplayer FPS Concord Coming Soon - Report

description: Samsung 980 Pro SSD with Heatsink (2TB)
title: Samsung 2TB PS5 SSD On Sale For Great Price Today Only (May 23)

description: Tobias Capwell is an independent scholar, curator, an expert on arms and armor, as well as a historical advisor for movies and TV.
title: Historian & Armor Expert Reacts to Total War: Warhammer 3's Factions & Units

description:
WWE announced Thursday morning it will now make one of its "Big Four" pay-per-views a two-night event. In 2020 Wrestlemania expanded to two nights for the first time and the tradition has stuck, now Summerslam will become two nights in 2026 in Minneapolis.

"For over 35 years Summerslam has delivered some of the most amazing moments in WWE history," Paul "Triple H" Levesque said in a video package. "In 2026, [we'll] once again make history. Working with Minnesota Sports and Events we're going to expand Summerslam to two nights. Saturday, August 1 and Sunday, August 2...WWE will bring two epic nights of Summerslam to the Twin Cities.

The Biggest Event of the Summer is getting even bigger. The first-ever two-night #SummerSlam comes to @usbankstadium in Minneapol
title: WWE Is Expanding Summerslam To Two Nights In 2026, Following Wrestlemania's Lead

description:
A Dexter prequel series--Dexter: Original Sin--in the works, and now three of its leads have been announced, including the actor who will play a young Dexter Morgan.

Variety reports that 29-year-old Irish actor Patrick Gibson (The OA, Shadow and Bone) will play a young Dexter, with Christian Slater (Mr. Robot) playing his adoptive father, Harry. Molly Brown (Senior Year), meanwhile, will play Dexter's sister, Debra. On the original show, these roles were played by Michael C. Hall, James Remar, and Jennifer Carpenter, respectively.

The prequel series, which has 10 episodes, is set in 1991, which is 15 years before the events of the original Dexter series. The show will follow young Dexter as he transitions in his life from student to "avenging serial killer."
title: Dexter Prequel Series Casts Young Dexter, Debra, And Harry

description:
The man who heads PlayStation Productions and product at PlayStation Studios believes that the future of gaming will be about "immersive narratives." In fact, Asad Qizilbash thinks developers will focus on emotional storytelling over visual fidelity in the future.

Spotted by VGC, Sony posted an interview with Qizilbash that discussed how the video game medium might change over the next 10 years. For creators, the PlayStation executive believes they'll "be able to just create so much more emotion in the stories. The focus is going to shift from graphics or visuals to immersive narratives that resonate long after the controller is set down."

Qizilbash is also bullish on AI and how that will affect the med
title: PlayStation Exec Believes Game Developers Will Prioritize "Immersive Narratives" Over Ever-Improving Graphics In Future

description:
Embracer has released its latest earnings briefing, and included in the report is some accounting for how the Alone in the Dark reboot performed commercially.

The company said the game didn't do as well as it hoped (via IGN), recording "softer-than-expected performance." Embracer used this language to describe the commercial performance of Alone in the Dark and Outcast: A New Beginning, both of which were published by THQ Nordic.

Embracer never said what its sales expectations for Alone in the Dark were in the first place, nor did the company reveal a sales number for the game now. The title launched on March 20 and
title: Alone In The Dark Reboot Starring Marvel And Star Wars Actors Comes Up Short

description:
There's still a lot we don't know about The Acolyte, the upcoming Star Wars live-action series on Disney+ that takes place roughly 100 years before the prequel trilogy. While most of the main characters of the show have been revealed, the trailers have only offered a few fleeting glimpses of an assassin whose face is hidden by a mask. Now, series creator Leslye Headland is shedding some light on the inspiration behind that character, and it came from a classic Star Wars video game.

Via Den of Geek, Headland confirmed that the character that caught her eye was Darth Traya, the primary villain of 2004's Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords.
title: The Acolyte Inspired By This Iconic Star Wars Game

description:
As part of its long-term strategy, Sony briefly showed a concept for a high-tech PlayStation controller in a new promotional video. To detail its Creative Entertainment Vision strategy designed to show what its products could look like a decade from now, the video showed off a controller with a radical redesign compared to the current DualSense model.

"Ten years from now, we will be living in a more multi-layered world where physical and virtual realities overlap without boundaries," Sony said in the video synopsis. "If Sony, as a creative entertainment company, would be filling the world with new Kando--a Japanese word meaning 'emotional involvement' or 'deep impression'-- in that future, what kind of experiential value would we be offering to make that happen? To explore this question, we conducted a prototyping exercise under the concept of Creative Entertainment Vision."
title: Sony's Idea For A Future PlayStation Controller Looks Like It Came Straight Out Of Minority Report

description:
Mad Max director George Miller wants Metal Gear designer Hideo Kojima to make a Mad Max game, and he also sounded off on 2015's Mad Max game and why he didn't love it.

Speaking to Gaming Bible, the Australian filmmaker said Kojima would be a top choice of his to make a Mad Max game, though he said he "would never ask him" because Kojima already has so much "fantastic stuff in his own head" that keeps him busy.

Miller also spoke candidly about 2015's Mad Max game from Just Cause studio Avalanche. He said plainly, "It wasn't as good as I wanted it to be." Upon reflection after that game came out, Miller said, "I'm one of those people that I'd rather not do something unless you can do it at the highest level."
title: George Miller Criticizes 2015's Mad Max Game, Developer Responds With Heated Messages

description:
Activision has officially announced Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 through a teaser video. It's rumored to release this October across Xbox, PlayStation, and PC. Microsoft now owns Activision and the Call of Duty franchise, but new releases--like Black Ops 6--will continue to launch as multiplatform releases.

The story for Black Ops 6 is rumored to take place, at least in part, during the Gulf War. Call of Duty games are known to be globetrotting affairs that travel through numerous locations--and time periods. So if the Gulf War is part of the game's story, it could be just one element of it.

A dark new chapter of the Black Ops franchise begins. Call of Duty: #BlackOps6 pic.twitter.com/db3lPR0ibI

— Call of Duty (@CallofDuty)
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Announced, See First Official Teaser

description:
Activision has officially announced Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 through a teaser video. It's rumored to release this October across Xbox, PlayStation, and PC. Microsoft now owns Activision and the Call of Duty franchise, but new releases--like Black Ops 6--will continue to launch as multiplatform releases.

Basically nothing is known about Black Ops 6 as of yet, but the teaser video describes it as a "dark new chapter" of the Black Ops series. The game's worldwide reveal will take place on June 9 as part of the Xbox Games Showcase event.

The story for Black Ops 6 is rumored to take place, at least in part, during the Gulf War. Call of Duty games are known to be globetrotting affairs that travel through numerous locations--and time periods. So if the Gulf War is part of the game's story, it could be just one element of it.
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Announced, Worldwide Reveal Set For June 9

description: Hellblade 2 is perhaps the most visually remarkable Xbox title to date, but is ultimately undermined by its emphasis on fidelity over story and gameplay.
title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade II GameSpot Review

description: Disney Lorcana's new expansion arrives next week, and Ursula's Return will introduce a brand-new wrinkle to the popular trading card game. On May 31, Lorcana is getting its first cooperative game with Illumineer's Quest - Deep Trouble. Preorders sold out in hours at Best Buy last week, but now you can preorder the new game at Amazon for $60. We'd recommend ordering soon, as we wouldn't be surprised if Amazon sells out, too. You can also preorder Illumineer's Trove at Amazon for $50, a complementary product for Deep Trouble that includes various accessories as well as eight Ursula's Return boo
title: Disney Lorcana TCG's New Co-Op Game Is Up For Preorder At Amazon
